languages.text: {n}Соломон прикладывает два пальца к уху, вслушиваясь в {g|Encyclopedia:CommBead}комм-бусину{/g}{/n}. "Другой отряд арбитров прижали — найдите способ открыть нам дверь, поблизости должен быть когитатор или пульт управления. Но сначала мы спустимся и займем позиции — надо ошеломить врага внезапной атакой".

{n}Solomorne puts two fingers to his ear, listening to his {g|Encyclopedia:CommBead}comm-bead{/g}.{/n} "Another Arbitrator squad has been hit hard. Find a way to open the door for us — there should be a cogitator or control panel nearby. But first, we will go down and get into position — we need to overwhelm the enemy with a surprise attack."
languages.original_text: {n}Соломон прикладывает два пальца к уху, вслушиваясь в {g|Encyclopedia:CommBead}комм-бусину{/g}{/n}. "Другой отряд арбитров прижали — найдите способ открыть нам дверь, поблизости должен быть когитатор или пульт управления. Но сначала мы спустимся и займем позиции — надо ошеломить врага внезапной атакой".

Find a way to open the door for us — there should be a cogitator or control panel nearby. But first we will go down and get into position — we need to overwhelm the enemy with a surprise attack."

Find a way to open the door for us — there should be a cogitator or control panel nearby. But first we will go down and get into position — we need to overwhelm the enemy with a surprise attack."

Find a way to open the door for us — there should be a cogitator or control panel nearby. But first, we will go down and get into position — we need to overwhelm the enemy with a surprise attack."

Find a way to open the door for us — there should be a cogitator or control panel nearby. But first, we will go down and get into position — we need to overwhelm the enemy with a surprise attack."

{n}Solomorne puts two fingers to his ear, listening to his comm-bead.{/n} "Another Arbitrator squad has been hit hard. Find a way to open the door for us — there should be a cogitator or control panel nearby. But first, we will go down and get into position — we need to overwhelm the enemy with a surprise attack."

{n}Solomorne puts two fingers to his ear, listening to his {g|Encyclopedia:CommBead}comm-bead{/g}.{/n} "Another Arbitrator squad has been hit hard. Find a way to open the door for us — there should be a cogitator or control panel nearby. But first, we will go down and get into position — we need to overwhelm the enemy with a surprise attack."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne legt zwei Finger an sein Ohr und lauscht seinem {g|Encyclopedia:CommBead}Voxstecker{/g}.{/n} "Ein weiterer Trupp von Arbitratoren wurde hart getroffen. Findet einen Weg, die Tür für uns zu öffnen ... es müsste in der Nähe einen Cogitator oder ein Bedienfeld geben. Aber zuerst gehen wir unten in Position ... wir müssen den Feind mit einem Überraschungsangriff überwältigen."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne puts two fingers to his ear, listening to his {g|Encyclopedia:CommBead}comm-bead{/g}.{/n} "Another Arbitrator squad has been hit hard. Find a way to open the door for us — there should be a cogitator or control panel nearby. But first, we will go down and get into position — we need to overwhelm the enemy with a surprise attack."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne legt zwei Finger an sein Ohr und lauscht seinem Voxstecker.{/n} "Ein weiterer Trupp von Arbitratoren wurde hart getroffen. Findet einen Weg, die Tür für uns zu öffnen ... es müsste in der Nähe einen Cogitator oder ein Bedienfeld geben. Aber zuerst gehen wir unten in Position ... wir müssen den Feind mit einem Überraschungsangriff überwältigen."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne place deux doigts sur son oreille pour écouter un message sur son {g|Encyclopedia:CommBead}communicateur{/g}.{/n} « Une autre escouade d'arbitrators a essuyé un assaut brutal. Trouvez un moyen de nous ouvrir la porte. Il doit y avoir un cogitateur ou un panneau de contrôle dans les parages. Mais laissez-nous d'abord le temps de nous déployer et de nous mettre en position pour submerger l'ennemi en l'attaquant par surprise. »
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne puts two fingers to his ear, listening to his {g|Encyclopedia:CommBead}comm-bead{/g}.{/n} "Another Arbitrator squad has been hit hard. Find a way to open the door for us — there should be a cogitator or control panel nearby. But first, we will go down and get into position — we need to overwhelm the enemy with a surprise attack."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne place deux doigts sur son oreille pour écouter un message sur son communicateur.{/n} « Une autre escouade d'arbitrators a essuyé un assaut brutal. Trouvez un moyen de nous ouvrir la porte. Il doit y avoir un cogitateur ou un panneau de contrôle dans les parages. Mais laissez-nous d'abord le temps de nous déployer et de nous mettre en position pour submerger l'ennemi en l'attaquant par surprise. »

languages.text: {n}Solomorne se lleva dos dedos a la oreja para activar su {g|Encyclopedia:CommBead}cuenta de comunicación{/g}.{/n} «Otra escuadra de Arbitrator ha mordido el polvo. Busque un modo de abrirnos la puerta; debería haber un cogitador o panel de control cerca. Pero primero bajaremos y ocuparemos posiciones: hemos de abrumar al enemigo con un ataque sorpresa».
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne puts two fingers to his ear, listening to his {g|Encyclopedia:CommBead}comm-bead{/g}.{/n} "Another Arbitrator squad has been hit hard. Find a way to open the door for us — there should be a cogitator or control panel nearby. But first, we will go down and get into position — we need to overwhelm the enemy with a surprise attack."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne se lleva dos dedos a la oreja para activar su cuenta de comunicación.{/n} «Otra escuadra de Arbitrator ha mordido el polvo. Busque un modo de abrirnos la puerta; debería haber un cogitador o panel de control cerca. Pero primero bajaremos y ocuparemos posiciones: hemos de abrumar al enemigo con un ataque sorpresa».

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙将两根手指搭在耳朵上，仔细聆听着{g|Encyclopedia:CommBead}通讯珠{/g}里的声音。{/n}“另一支法务官小队也遭到了重创。我们得想办法把门打开，附近应该有沉思者或控制面板之类的东西。但在此之前，我们必须先前往下方。我们可以对敌人发动突然袭击，打垮他们。”
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne puts two fingers to his ear, listening to his {g|Encyclopedia:CommBead}comm-bead{/g}.{/n} "Another Arbitrator squad has been hit hard. Find a way to open the door for us — there should be a cogitator or control panel nearby. But first, we will go down and get into position — we need to overwhelm the enemy with a surprise attack."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙将两根手指搭在耳朵上，仔细聆听着通讯珠里的声音。{/n}“另一支法务官小队也遭到了重创。我们得想办法把门打开，附近应该有沉思者或控制面板之类的东西。但在此之前，我们必须先前往下方。我们可以对敌人发动突然袭击，打垮他们。”

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンは耳に指を二本あて、{g|Encyclopedia:CommBead}通信機{/g}からの音に耳を傾けた。{/n}「別のアービトレイターの部隊が激しい攻撃を受けました。ドアを開ける方法を見つけてください。近くに考算機か操作パネルがあるはずです。まずは下へ降りて配置につきましょう。奇襲で敵を一気に制圧するんです」
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne puts two fingers to his ear, listening to his {g|Encyclopedia:CommBead}comm-bead{/g}.{/n} "Another Arbitrator squad has been hit hard. Find a way to open the door for us — there should be a cogitator or control panel nearby. But first, we will go down and get into position — we need to overwhelm the enemy with a surprise attack."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンは耳に指を二本あて、通信機からの音に耳を傾けた。{/n}「別のアービトレイターの部隊が激しい攻撃を受けました。ドアを開ける方法を見つけてください。近くに考算機か操作パネルがあるはずです。まずは下へ降りて配置につきましょう。奇襲で敵を一気に制圧するんです」

languages.text: {n}Solomorne, iki parmağını kulağına götürüp {g|Encyclopedia:CommBead}mikro telsizi{/g} dinliyor.{/n} "Bir Yargıcı mangası daha ağır darbe almış. Kapıyı açmanın bir yolunu bulun. Yakınlarda bir kavramsayar veya kontrol paneli olmalı. Ancak önce saklanıp yerimizi almalıyız ki düşmanı gafil avlayıp tuzağa düşürebilelim."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne puts two fingers to his ear, listening to his {g|Encyclopedia:CommBead}comm-bead{/g}.{/n} "Another Arbitrator squad has been hit hard. Find a way to open the door for us — there should be a cogitator or control panel nearby. But first, we will go down and get into position — we need to overwhelm the enemy with a surprise attack."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne, iki parmağını kulağına götürüp mikro telsizi dinliyor.{/n} "Bir Yargıcı mangası daha ağır darbe almış. Kapıyı açmanın bir yolunu bulun. Yakınlarda bir kavramsayar veya kontrol paneli olmalı. Ancak önce saklanıp yerimizi almalıyız ki düşmanı gafil avlayıp tuzağa düşürebilelim."
